tool_description: Search over 500+ million products with UPC, EAN, JAN, ISBN barcodes.
name: Barcodes
title: Barcodes

api_list.name: Search & Product Details
api_list.description: It returns product results if you enter a search term, and returns product details if you enter a barcode number.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
If you want search results - **page number**
If you are querying for a barcode, leave it blank.

If you leave it blank (if you are querying for a search term), the first page will be returned.
